education.field_of_study: Board of Intermediate Education, Andhra Pradesh
The Board of Secondary Education Of Andhra Pradesh

projects.name: Article Recommendation System
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model using Python and scikit-learn to recommend articles based on user interests, improving content relevance and user engagement. Designed a user-friendly interface using Flask for enhanced article browsing and recommendation.

projects.name: Ride Pooling
projects.description: Created a system with Node.js and React to facilitate ride sharing, reducing commuting costs and optimizing vehicle usage. Engineered a robust architecture supporting real-time data processing and enhancing user interactions during ride pooling.

projects.name: Virtual Voice Assistant
projects.description: Developed a Python application for executing tasks via voice commands, enhancing accessibility and user interaction. Integrated Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques with NLTK for accurate interpretation and response to user commands.

projects.name: Online Survey System
projects.description: Designed and implemented a Java-based platform for conducting online surveys, utilizing MySQL for data management and storage. Developed features ensuring organized and insightful analysis of survey responses to facilitate decision-making.

experiences.company_name: Andhra Pradesh State Skill Development Corporation
experiences.description: Integrated Django and Python for front-end development, enhancing project capabilities. Executed 2 projects, including a mini project (Leave Management System) and a final project. Managed databases for property listings, customer information, and transaction records, optimizing data accessibility and operational efficiency.

Conducted extensive Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) on a large credit dataset comprising over 10,000 records, extracting actionable insights into borrower behavior and credit risk. Applied advanced data cleaning techniques and statistical analysis, ensuring data accuracy and enhancing decision-making processes in credit assessment.
